paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val122Ile, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with an increased risk of heart failure.

variants.additional_notes: The study indicates a significant association between the Val122Ile variant and heart failure risk.
key_quotes: the incidence of heart failure was 15.6 per 1000 person-years among Val122Ile variant carriers compared with 7.2 per 1000 person-years among noncarriers

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
